onboarding.slideOne_title:
Payments and
payment requests
on the XRP Ledger
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: Add multiple accounts, in full access mode, or read only. Send transactions and sign requests with your full access accounts.
onboarding.slideThree_desc: The Xumm application and platform are built with security as a priority. Never enter your secrets again, sign transactions from your own, trusted device.
onboarding.slideFour_desc: You can send and receive XRP and other trusted tokens as well
onboarding.v2homepage_noacc2: Import your existing account or create a new account.

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: We use the passcode to lock the app, confirm settings and to keep your account secure.
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: You will need your passcode to unlock the app
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Unable to store the passcode. This should not happen. A bug report was sent to the Xaman support team. Please contact us at support@xaman.app for more information.
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: The selected passcode is easy to guess. We recommend you to choose a stronger one.

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: To make your account safer, you can activate the Biometric Authentication (FaceID /TouchID).

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: We use push notification to send sign requests
setupPermissions.pushRegisterError: It seems we couldn't enable push notifications at this moment. You can activate them later in the app settings under Settings -> Advance. No worries, you can continue with the setup for now!

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
Xaman is a non custodial wallet, meaning your funds aren't in Xaman custody, but 'live' on the XRP Ledger.

Only you can access your funds with your account secrets, as generated by Xaman or imported into Xaman.

This means Xaman and the Xaman team cannot access and cannot recover your funds if you make a mistake or lose your secret keys.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
Only you, using your account secret(s) can access your funds.

You and you alone are responsible for keeping them safe, offline.

Write down your backups at multiple offline locations.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: I will keep my secret keys safe and offline.
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
Xaman cannot revert transactions, or recover funds if you make a mistake.

Transactions are instant and irreversible.
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: I'm responsible for keeping my keys and funds safe
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedger: Your funds 'live' on the XRP ledger
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
Xaman is an XRP ledger client application.

This means your XRP does not reside in Xaman but on the XRP Ledger.

Transactions sent and received are sent and received live on/by the XRP ledger.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: All of my funds are stored and registered on the XRP Ledger, not on the Xaman application
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
Xaman and the Xaman support department WILL NEVER ask for your secret

If someone does, or asks you to enter your secret somewhere, you are being scammed.

Please do contact us with as much information that you have about the incident.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: I will never share my secret keys with anyone nor enter them elsewhere
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: Using Xaman with a new device will require you to re-enter your secret keys for any accounts you have previously created.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: I will keep my secret account keys safe and offline, so I can re-enter them if I get a new device.
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions. Our FAQ and support channel can be found here: https://support.xaman.app.

Please note: This is THE ONLY trustworthy channel for XUMM support.
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: I will only trust answers from the Xaman support team at https://support.xaman.app
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Please read the above text carefully

home.howActivateMyAccount: How can I activate my account?
home.otherAssetsDesc: The XRP ledger also allows you to hold balances of, and to send and receive, tokens other than XRP. These tokens can be issued by other accounts on the XRP ledger. If you want to be able to send or receive a non-XRP token, you will have to trust the issuer of the non-XRP token.
home.nativeAssetYouOwnVsYourSpendableBalance: %{nativeAsset} you own vs. your spendable balance.
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: It’s a little bit empty here add your first account.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Saját kulcsa van az írásvédett fiókhoz, vagy ez a csereszámlája?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: Nem foglalhat közvetlenül az adatcseréhez: ehhez egy cél címkére van szükség. Kérjük, adja meg a célcímkét a cseréről, és helyezze el saját kezűleg.

account.addAccountDescription: Importálja a meglévő fiókot, vagy hozzon létre egy új fiókot.
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Kérem, adja meg a számokat, a saját biztonsága érdekében: azt akarjuk, hogy erősítse meg, hogy leírta.
account.invalidSecretNumber: The numbers entered do not match the requested row of numbers.
account.PleaseEnterYourPasswordForAccount: Please enter your password for account
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Hozzon létre egy kiterjesztett hosszúságú jelszót, amelyet könnyű megjegyezni, de mások számára lehetetlen találgatni.
account.passwordShouldContain: A jelszó erősségének legalább Fair-nek kell lennie, használjon hosszú vagy ennél nehezebb jelszót (hosszú jelszó jobb).
account.passwordConfirmNotMatch: Your entered passwords do not match
account.chooseWisely: Please choose the security level that suits this account
account.passcodeOptionDesc: Ez ideális a napi kiadásokra. A tranzakciókat csak úgy írhatja alá, ha egyszerűen megmutatja az arcát, az ujját pásztázva vagy belépve a jelszót.
account.passwordOptionDesc: This option is better for long term storage of XRP and tokens and requires a password to sign transactions
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Itt az új számlája. Az előállított nyilvános számlacímhez támogatást kaphat.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Account address copied to the clipboard
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Írja le az összes sort egy darab papírra, és tartsa biztonságos helyen! Ha az eszköz összeomlik, és már nincsenek meg a titkos számok, a pénzeszközei elvesznek.
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Csak te nyúlhatsz a pénzedhez, de a titkos számaidat biztonságban kell tartanod. A titkotok 8 sorból áll (A-H címke), amelyek soronként 6 számjegyet tartalmaznak.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Soha ne ossza meg a titkos számokat (privát kulcs) valaki mással. Ha megteszed, elveszted a hozzáférést a forrásaidhoz.
account.pleaseWriteDownAllNumbers: Please write down all the numbers
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (Any entered inputs will be cleared for security reasons)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (you have to re-fill all the inputs for security reasons)
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: Please select your account secret type
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: A Tangem kártya még nem tartalmaz XRP főkönyvi számlát. A kártya használatához a kártyát a kártyával kell előállítani.
account.tangemLongTapExplain: Ez a mechanizmus ismét védelmet nyújt a kártyával szemben, így késleltetni fogja a visszavonás és a parancsnokság felmentését.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: A kártya állapotának módosítását tartalmazó parancs végrehajtása előtt be kell írnia a jelszót.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Using Tangem cards requires NFC capabilities. Your phone does not seem to support NFC.
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: You can upgrade a read only account to a full access account later on
account.secretNumbersDesc: Preferred account type. 8 rows of 6 digits
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: Kérem, adja meg a mnemonikus szavait!
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Please provide your Mnemonic (24 words) for your account.
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Invalid HEX private key! HEX private keys should be 66 HEX characters (A-F, 0-9) long.
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Kérjük, adja meg a fiók titkára/családját.
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Adja meg a fiók nevét, például "Spend" vagy "Takarék".
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.accountSettingsDescription: Itt szerkesztheti a fiókbeállításokat vagy a fiókcímkét.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: A hozzáférési szintet frissíti, ehhez a fiókhoz importálnia kell a saját kulcsát.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: Leosztályozod a hozzáférési szintedet. Ezzel elveszítheti a saját kulcsát a fiókhoz. Biztos vagy benne?
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: You are downgrading your access level. Are you sure?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: Eltávolítja ezt az eszközt a fiókjából. Ez a művelet nem vonható vissza. Biztos vagy benne?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Biztonsági szint módosítása jelenleg nem érhető el
account.accountRemoveWarning: A fiókja véglegesen törlésre kerül a Xaman-ből, biztos benne?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: A fiókcímkének 16 karakternél kisebbnek kell lennie!
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.activateRegularKeyAccountWarning:
If you want to use this account as Regular key only, you DO NOT have to activate the account.

However, if you want to use this account also to transact, you can activate this account.
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: A kiválasztott fiók nincs aktiválva. A tranzakció aláírásához ki kell választania egy aktivált fiókot!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: A megadott titok egy másik r-címre tartozik. Ha normál kulcsot szeretne importálni, akkor [Új fiók importálása]. Ha nem, akkor [törölje] és ellenőrizze a bejegyzést.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: A fiók elsődleges kulcsa le van tiltva, és a normál kulcsfiók nem található a fiókok listájában!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: A fiók normál kulcsa nem került importálásra a bejelentkezéshez!
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: A jelenlegi jelszó nem lehet üres!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: You're all set! You can now go to the next step.
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: A tranzakció DISABLES a fiók privát kulcsát. Ez talán kizárhat téged. Csak akkor folytasd, ha teljesen biztos vagy benne, hogy ezt akarod, és tudod, mit csinálsz.
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert:
Ha figyelembe veszi az mnemonikus fiókját, miközben a fiókja jelentős értéket tartalmaz (pl. Megtakarítások, nagyobb mennyiségű XRP vagy egyéb tokenek)

Kérjük, fontolja meg egy új fiók létrehozását a Xaman-ben, hogy az mnemonikus fiókját offline tartsa.
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
Az Exchange (betét) fiók nem importálható. Ez nem teszi lehetővé, hogy nyomon kövesse a saját egyensúlyát a csere során.

Egy írásvédett fiók importálása csak akkor működik, ha ez a saját, aktivált fiókja, például a hardvertárca fiókja.
account.readOnlyAccountSpendableBalanceWarning: Please note: The access level for this account is Read-Only. There is currently no way to sign transactions that can affect the account state in any form.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This is an Account Delete transaction. When signing your account will be deleted, and all your remaining funds (except for the last %{ownerReserve} reserved XRP, as the fee on the  XRP ledger for deleting an account is %{ownerReserve} XRP) will be sent to the configured destination. Please check the destination twice, and ONLY continue if you ACTUALLY want to delete your account on the XRP ledger
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: A fiók nem törölhető, mivel a fiók specifikus XRP főkönyvi objektumokat tartalmaz, mint más eszközök, Decentralizált Exchange ajánlatok, Escrows (létrehozóként vagy kedvezményezettként)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: This account cannot be deleted yet. It takes %{remainingSequence} more ledgers to close before this account can be deleted.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Unable to check for account objects, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Unable to fetch the current ledger sequence. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Unable to get destination account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: A célszámla nincs aktiválva, az XRP főkönyvben egy finanszírozású fiók lehet.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destination Address requires a Destination Tag
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: A cél fiók és forrás nem lehet ugyanaz.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: A fiók aktiválása követelmény az XRP főkönyvben. Az aktiváláshoz először legalább %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} letétet kell elhelyeznie.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: Új fiókot importált az XRP főkönyvbe. A fiók nincs aktiválva. A fiók aktiválása követelmény az XRP főkönyvben. Az aktiváláshoz először legalább %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} letétet kell elhelyeznie.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: Az első %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}-t a számláján nem lehet elkölteni, de fenn kell tartani, hogy a számlája aktív legyen, és fizessen a főkönyvi díjért.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: A fenntartott %{nativeAsset} nem jelenik meg egyensúlyban a Xaman-ben, de a saját képernyőn a "Magyarázza meg az egyenlegem" gombot, az %{nativeAsset}-egyenleg felett.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
Ez a cím egy csere címnek tűnik, biztos, hogy folytatni kívánja?

Soha nem küldheted el ezt a címet anélkül, hogy tiszteletben tartanád a csere utasításait.
account.accountDestroyWarning: A fiókja véglegesen törölve lesz, biztos benne?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Unable to hide this account. At least one account should be visible.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tap and hold on an item to reorder by the desired priority
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: If you want to open an XRP Ledger account, please enter your secret keys.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Your XRP Ledger account is going to be:
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
If you proceed, you will import an XRP Ledger account from Secret Numbers. You are the sole party responsible to generate the Secret Numbers. We recommend you to use an offline method (eg. with dice) to generate them. After you generated the numbers, you must store them (eg. stamped in metal, written down).
YOU SHOULD PROCEED ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
While adding a passcode to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your passcode.

Are you really sure you want to add a passcode to your card?
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem cards is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES256 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: This amount is bigger than what you can spend (%{spendable})
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: The maximum amount you can send is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: The issuer of %{currency} charges a Transfer Fee. The max. amount you can send (respecting the Transfer Fee) is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Az egyensúly nem elegendő a díj fedezésére (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: A forrás-és célcím nem lehet ugyanaz!
send.enterANameOrAddress: Enter a name or an address
send.transferredSuccessfully: A tranzakció sikeresen regisztrálva lett az %{network}.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Your transaction has been signed and submitted successfully, however, we could not confirm transaction finality.

This can be caused by an internet connection hiccup or increased load on the XRP Ledger node you are connected to.

Please manually verify if this transaction shows in your transaction history (Events).
send.invalidDestinationTag: The QR-code doesn't contain a valid Destination Tag. Please check the scanned QR-code and try again
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destination account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: A kiválasztott fiók nem támogatja a kiválasztott eszközt.
send.memoPublicWarning: Memo info will be public for everyone
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: A célszámlát még nem használták, és nincs egyensúlyban. Az XRP főkönyvi számla aktiválásához legalább %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} kezdeti letét szükséges.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning:
Sending to the given destination account may be risky: it has never been used and has a zero balance, which is commonly seen in scams. We advise verifying the owner's authenticity to safeguard your assets. If you're confident in its safety but aware of the risks.

If you continue sending to this account, %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} of the %{amount} %{nativeAsset} will be used to activate the account on the XRP ledger.
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: A célszámlát még nem használták, és nincs egyensúlyban. Az XRP főkönyvi számla aktiválásához a fiókba legalább %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} kezdeti letétet kell küldeni. A nem %{nativeAsset}-eszközök nem használhatók az első letéthez.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: A fizetés elküldéséhez a cél címke szükséges.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: A címzett fiók adatai nem kérhetők le, próbálkozzon újra.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: The destination account is 'Black Holed', sending to this account will cause losing sent XRP.
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: This address requires a Destination Tag
send.trustLineLimitExceeded: A TrustLine korlát túllépésre került, most: %{balance}, max: %{peer_limit}, elérhető a következő kiadáshoz: %{available}. A címzett frissítheti a Trustline korlátot.
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does not have a TrustLine for this token setup to the issuer of this token.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: You are sending to an account with destination tag. Please double check the destination tag: if you send to the wrong tag, you will need support of the Destination to retrieve your funds.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: The destination account indicates that it doesn't want to receive %{nativeAsset} payments. Only non-%{nativeAsset} payments can be sent to this destination.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: A likviditás hiánya miatt jelenleg nem küldhető el a kifizetés.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: This address is under investigation. Please cancel this transaction.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: If you want to continue (not recommended) provide a reason in your own words:
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Please enter your reason to continue

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Válasszon ki egy kibocsátót, és válassza ki a hozzáadni kívánt eszközt. Ezt a listát a Xaman fejlesztők tartják fenn.
asset.successRemoved: Token has been removed successfully from your account
asset.failedRemove: Az eszközt nem lehet eltávolítani. Hiba történt!
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: This TrustLine still contains a really small amount of %{balance} %{currency}. If you continue, it will be sent back to the issuer before your TrustLine is deleted.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Your dust balance has been sent back to the issuer. The TrustLine can now be eliminated.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your account will increase your enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: Ez az eszköz nem távolítható el a fiókjából. Vagy azért, mert a kibocsátó adott beállításokat adott hozzá az eszközhöz, vagy mert a kibocsátó fiókjuk nincs megfelelően konfigurálva.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling not turned off for this Trust Line, if you don't know what this is and/or this is not on purpose, please update this setting to prevent potential loss of %{token} tokens
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning others cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, Xaman can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!
asset.copyIssuerAddressWarning:
%{issuerAddress}

You are about to copy the Issuer Address. Please note that sending assets to the issuer address will PERMANENTLY BURN THE TOKENS. The Issuer Address for an asset should only be used to verify the legitimacy of the asset.

exchange.doYouWantToExchange: Biztos benne, hogy a %{payAmount} %{getAmount} %{payCurrency} %{payCurrency} %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}értékre kívánja cserélni?
exchange.failedExchange: A likviditás hiánya vagy a frissített árfolyamok miatt jelenleg nem cserélhetők le.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: Nincs elég likviditás, most nem cserélhetünk!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: Viszonylag alacsony a likviditás. Még folytathatod, de talán nem kapod meg a legjobb arányt az egész cserébe!
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: Ha egy kért árszinten kíván ajánlatot létrehozni, akkor a harmadik fél Xaman engedélyezett XRP Toolkit alkalmazás segítségével létrehozhat egy korlátot.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: Az összeg nem cserélhető ki: nincs elegendő ajánlat a Decentralizált Exchange-en.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: Az összeget nem lehet kicserélni: a Decentralizált Exchange ajánlataira alapozva, nem lenne képes visszaadni.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: Az eladási és vételi ajánlatok közötti különbség túl magas.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: Az árfolyam rossz lesz, mivel nincs elegendő (jó) ajánlat a Decentralizált Exchange-en.
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: Az árfolyam rossz lenne, ha megpróbálná visszacserélni, mivel nincs elegendő (jó) ajánlat a Decentralizált Exchange-en.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.

scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainAccountAddre: The clipboard data does not contain a valid %{nativeAsset} address!
scan.scannedQRIsNotXamanPayload: A szkenner QR kód nem Xaman hasznos tartalom!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXamanPayload: The clipboard data does not contain valid Xaman payload!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: Ez a QR-kód nem az, amire számítottunk!
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Érvénytelen QR-kód (Xaman esetén), próbálkozzon újra, vagy próbálkozzon újra
scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid clipboard data (for Xaman). Try a new one or try again.

payload.UnableVerifyPayload: Unable to verify the payload signature
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: Ezt a hasznos terhet már aláírták vagy elutasították. Ismételje meg a kérést előállító folyamatot, és vizsgálja meg az új kérést.
payload.payloadExpired: A hasznos tartalom lejárt. Ismételje meg a kérést előállító folyamatot, és vizsgálja meg az új kérést.
payload.payloadAlreadySigned: The payload has already been signed
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Invalid or missing signed transaction blob
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: A hasznos tartalom érvénytelen, és automatikusan visszautasításra kerül.
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: A kérést figyelmen kívül hagyja és bezárja.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Nincs elég likviditás ehhez a fizetéshez.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Unable to verify the token exchange rate. Please make sure you are properly connected to the internet
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Unable to get network fee, please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: A Beiktatás csak akkor váltható ki, ha az Ellenőrzési cél fiók Xaman-ben van jelen Olvasás/írás (vagy normál kulcs) módban.
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Unable to get check object. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Az ellenőrzési objektum nem kérhető le, győződjön meg róla, hogy az ellenőrzés létezik az XRPL Ledgerben.
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: A (nem lejárt) ellenőrzést csak a létrehozott vagy célszámlát létrehozó fiók törölheti.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Note: when deleting your XRP ledger account and sending the remaining balance to an exchange, make sure the destination exchange supports deposits using AccountDelete transactions. Not all exchanges do, which results in a support procedure with the exchange to get your funds credited to your account
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError: This payload is not available on the network you are connected with
payload.pleaseSwitchToNetworkAndTryAgain: Please switch to %{network} and try again
payload.oracleDocumentIdCopiedToClipboard: Oracle Document Id copied to clipboard
payload.didDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the Decentralized Identifier (DID) tied to the selected account. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.
payload.oracleDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the oracle record identified by the above Oracle Document ID. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.

monetization.comingPaymentWarning: You're still enjoying Xaman for free, but you're nearing our free limit. To support Xaman's innovation and security, a small in-app payment may be requested soon.
monetization.paymentRequiredMessage: A small payment is required to maintain unlimited access for the next 30 days. Alternatively, Xaman will switch to limited-use mode until your monthly limits reset automatically.
monetization.prePurchaseMessage: You're currently unable to open xApps and sign requests. A small payment is required to unlock 30 days of unrestricted access to Xaman.
monetization.monetizationRequiredForThisFeature: You currently can’t open Sign Requests & xApps: a small payment is required to unlock a 30 days of unrestricted use of Xaman. Developing Xaman, building secure software takes a lot of resources. We hope you will support us continuing to build. If you decide not to: every month your limits will reset, allowing you to open xApps & Sign Requests again.
monetization.noPreviousPurchases: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore. If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.
monetization.errorRestorePurchase:
An unexpected error occurred while checking your purchase history.

Please try again later or contact our support team if the issue persists.
monetization.couldNotFetchProductDetails: Error fetching product details. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
monetization.unlockFullFunctionality: Unlock full functionality with a small payment.
monetization.prePurchaseTipIos: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Apple ID is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.
monetization.prePurchaseTipAndroid: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Google account is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Terms of Service
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Change Logs
errors.tecPATH_DRY:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
errors.tecPATH_PARTIAL: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.
errors.tecHOOK_REJECTED:
Rejected by hook on sending or receiving account.

%{hookReturnString}
